TEXT.TITLE: SAUDI ARABIA BUYS RBD PALM OLEIN
TEXT.BODY: Saudi Arabia bought 4,000 tonnes of Malaysian refined bleached deodorised palm olein for June 1/10 shipment at around 356 dlrs per tonne cost and freight Jeddah, traders said. Reuter
